lead_paragraph: Fernando Alonso won his fifth consecutive Formula One pole yesterday, setting himself up for a strong run in the Canadian Grand Prix and a chance to widen his lead in the standings. Alonso, the defending series champion, has a 23-point lead over Michael Schumacher heading into today's race in Montreal. Schumacher qualified a distant fifth.
